	#mysd {

<script>
	(function () {
		mboxDefine('nada', 'entity_profile');
		function conlog(msg) { if (window.location.href.indexOf('debug') >= 0) console.log(msg); }
		conlog("MySD Recommendations Desktop");
		var mysdrecomax = 4;

		window.tileTrack = function (e) {
			var fid = e.getAttribute('ent-id');
			var ftn = e.getAttribute('ent-track');
			var faf = e.getAttribute('ent-aff');
			var ficon = e.getAttribute('ent-icon');
			var flink = e.getAttribute('ent-href');
			var ftext = e.querySelector('.tname').getAttribute('ent-title');
			var fcta = e.querySelector('.ctaText').getAttribute('ent-ctatext');

			var flinkDE = e.getAttribute('ent-href-de');
			var ftextDE = e.querySelector('.tname').getAttribute('ent-title-de');
			var fctaDE = e.querySelector('.ctaText').getAttribute('ent-ctatext-de');

			var flinkFR = e.getAttribute('ent-href-fr');
			var ftextFR = e.querySelector('.tname').getAttribute('ent-title-fr');
			var fctaFR = e.querySelector('.ctaText').getAttribute('ent-ctatext-fr');

			var flinkIT = e.getAttribute('ent-href-it');
			var ftextIT = e.querySelector('.tname').getAttribute('ent-title-it');
			var fctaIT = e.querySelector('.ctaText').getAttribute('ent-ctatext-it');

			var flinkEN = e.getAttribute('ent-href-en');
			var ftextEN = e.querySelector('.tname').getAttribute('ent-title-en');
			var fctaEN = e.querySelector('.ctaText').getAttribute('ent-ctatext-en');

			// site section
			var cfu = '';
			if (window.location.href.indexOf('/de/privatkunden') >= 0 ||
				window.location.href.indexOf('/fr/clients-prives') >= 0) cfu = 'res';
			else if (window.location.href.indexOf('/de/business') >= 0) cfu = 'sme';

			var logst = 'undefined';
			if (typeof window.scsHeader != 'undefined' &&
				typeof window.scsHeader.profile != 'undefined' &&
				typeof window.scsHeader.profile.isLoggedIn != 'undefined')
				logst = window.scsHeader.profile.isLoggedIn();

			// mbox
			mboxUpdate('entity_profile',
				'entity.id=' + fid,

				'entity.titleDE=' + ftextDE,
				'entity.pageUrlDE=' + flinkDE,
				'entity.ctaTextDE=' + fctaDE,

				'entity.titleFR=' + ftextFR,
				'entity.pageUrlFR=' + flinkFR,
				'entity.ctaTextFR=' + fctaFR,

				'entity.titleIT=' + ftextIT,
				'entity.pageUrlIT=' + flinkIT,
				'entity.ctaTextIT=' + fctaIT,

				'entity.titleEN=' + ftextEN,
				'entity.pageUrlEN=' + flinkEN,
				'entity.ctaTextEN=' + fctaEN,

				'entity.affinity=' + faf,
				'entity.trackingName=' + ftn,
				'entity.thumbnail=' + ficon,
				'entity.thumbnailUrl=' + ficon,
				'entity.platform=desktop',
				'entity.loggedin=' + logst,
				'entity.language=' + document.documentElement.lang
			);

			window.naturalTrack(e, flink, ftn, faf, cfu);

			setTimeout(function () { window.location.href = flink; }, 500);
		}

		window.naturalTrack = function (el, flink, ftn, aff, cfu) {
			window.utag_data.link_text = flink;
			var trackObj = $.extend(true, {}, SCS.datalayer.data);
			trackObj.event = {
				'action': 'click',
				'label': ftn,
				'location': 'content-home-' + cfu,
				'category': 'customer-tiles-case-' + aff,
			};
			//trackObj.product = null;
			//console.log(trackObj.event);
			SCS.datalayer.track(trackObj);
		}

		function welcomeText() {
			/**
			 * waiting for jQuery to load and tiles to load
			 * comment out if no trouble with jQuery existance
			 */
			var myCap = 200;
			var myVal = setInterval(function () {
				if (typeof window.jQuery == "function") {
					clearInterval(myVal);

					// identify language
					var lang = 'DE';
					if (window.location.href.indexOf('/de/') >= 0) lang = 'DE';
					else if (window.location.href.indexOf('/fr/') >= 0) lang = 'FR';
					else if (window.location.href.indexOf('/it/') >= 0) lang = 'IT';
					else if (window.location.href.indexOf('/en/') >= 0) lang = 'EN';

					// generate welcome text
					var wetext = '';
					if (lang == 'DE') {
						wetext = 'Willkommen in Ihrer Swisscom Welt.';
						if (window.scsHeader.profile.isLoggedIn()) wetext = 'Hallo ' + decodeURI(window.scsHeader.profile.data.cust_fname) + ' ' + decodeURI(window.scsHeader.profile.data.cust_lname) + '<br>Willkommen in Ihrer Swisscom Welt.';
					}
					else if (lang == 'FR') {
						wetext = 'Bienvenue dans votre univers Swisscom.';
						if (window.scsHeader.profile.isLoggedIn()) wetext = 'Bonjour ' + decodeURI(window.scsHeader.profile.data.cust_fname) + '  ' + decodeURI(window.scsHeader.profile.data.cust_lname) + ',<br>Bienvenue dans votre univers Swisscom.';
					}
					else if (lang == 'IT') {
						wetext = 'Benvenuti nel mondo Swisscom.';
						if (window.scsHeader.profile.isLoggedIn()) wetext = 'Salve ' + decodeURI(window.scsHeader.profile.data.cust_fname) + '  ' + decodeURI(window.scsHeader.profile.data.cust_lname) + ',<br>Benvenuti nel mondo Swisscom.';
					}
					else if (lang == 'EN') {
						wetext = 'Welcome to your Swisscom world.';
						if (window.scsHeader.profile.isLoggedIn()) wetext = 'Hello ' + decodeURI(window.scsHeader.profile.data.cust_fname) + ' ' + decodeURI(window.scsHeader.profile.data.cust_lname) + '<br>Welcome to your Swisscom world.';
					}

					// add welcome text
					$('div.stage').after('<div id="mysd"><div class="wmsg"><h1 class="ctHidden" style="color: #015;">' + wetext + '</h1></div></div>');
				}
				myCap--;
				if (myCap < 0) { clearInterval(myVal); }
			}, 50);
		}

		function createTemplate(entity) {
			var lang = 'DE';
			if (window.location.href.indexOf('/de/') >= 0) lang = 'DE';
			else if (window.location.href.indexOf('/fr/') >= 0) lang = 'FR';
			else if (window.location.href.indexOf('/it/') >= 0) lang = 'IT';
			else if (window.location.href.indexOf('/en/') >= 0) lang = 'EN';

			var title = 'title' + lang;
			var ctaText = 'ctaText' + lang;
			var pageUrl = 'pageUrl' + lang;

			conlog('hello "' + entity[title] + '": ' + entity[ctaText] + ', ' + entity[pageUrl] + ', ' + entity.thumbnail + ', ' + entity.affinity + ', ' + entity.trackingName);

			//return HTML, broken down by new lines for syntax highlighters
			return '<div class="parbase section target mysdPlh"><div class="nrecotile"><div class="reference default parbase"><div style="display:inline;" class="cq-dd-paragraph"><div class="sdiproxy link"><a class="aTag" data-track-linkname="" data-track-action="" data-track-label="" data-track-location="" data-track-category="customer-tiles-case-' + entity.affinity + '" data-conversion-id="" data-conversion-subject="" data-sdx-lightbox-title="" onclick="window.tileTrack(this)" ent-id="' + entity.id + '" ent-track="' + entity.trackingName + '" ent-aff="' + entity.affinity + '" ent-icon="' + entity.thumbnail + '" '
				+ 'ent-href="' + entity[pageUrl] + '" '
				+ 'ent-href-de="' + entity.pageUrlDE + '" '
				+ 'ent-href-fr="' + entity.pageUrlFR + '" '
				+ 'ent-href-it="' + entity.pageUrlIT + '" '
				+ 'ent-href-en="' + entity.pageUrlEN + '" '
				+ 'style="text-decoration: none;"><div class="sdx-container section"><div class="modCard border-top-only" data-connectors="formpriceupdate" style="border-color: #1af;"><div class="normalDisplay"><div class="normal parsys"><div class="backgroundcontainer section"><div class="modBackgroundContainer cf" style="background-color: #f0f5f7; border-top: solid 18px #f0f5f7;"><div class="container-content"><div class="hovercontainer section"><div class="modHoverContainer" style="height: 67px;"><div class="normalDisplay"><div class="normal parsys"><div class="sdx-container section"><style>.typography.idtx p { font-size:26px; letter-spacing:-0.5px; line-height:31px; }</style><div class="typography idtx transparent center" style="margin-bottom: 12px; font-size: 26px; line-height: 31px; letter-spacing:-0.5px;"><p><span class="dummy"></span><span class="icon swisscomIconFont" aria-hidden="true">'
				+ entity.thumbnail + '</span><span class="dummy"></span></p></div></div><div class="sdx-container section"><div class="typography transparent left" style=" margin-bottom: 13px; letter-spacing:defaultpx;"><p style="text-align: center;"><span style="letter-spacing: -0.1px;" class="tname" '
				+ 'ent-title="' + entity[title] + '" '
				+ 'ent-title-de="' + entity.titleDE + '" '
				+ 'ent-title-fr="' + entity.titleFR + '" '
				+ 'ent-title-it="' + entity.titleIT + '" '
				+ 'ent-title-en="' + entity.titleEN + '" '
				+ '>'
				+ entity[title] + '</span></p></div></div></div></div></div></div><div class="sdx-container section"><div class="typography transparent sc-blue left" style=" margin-bottom: 19px; letter-spacing:defaultpx;"><h6 style="text-align: center;" class="ctaText" '
				+ 'ent-ctatext="' + entity[ctaText] + '" '
				+ 'ent-ctatext-de="' + entity.ctaTextDE + '" '
				+ 'ent-ctatext-fr="' + entity.ctaTextFR + '" '
				+ 'ent-ctatext-it="' + entity.ctaTextIT + '" '
				+ 'ent-ctatext-en="' + entity.ctaTextEN + '" '
				+ '>'
				+ entity[ctaText] + '</h6></div></div></div><div class="tail" style="border-color: rgb(240, 245, 247);"></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></a></div></div></div></div></div>';
		}

		function deduplicateWithPriorities(array) {
			var result = [];
			var set = {};

			array.forEach(function (v) {
				if (!set.hasOwnProperty(v.id) && v.id !== '') {
					set[v.id] = true;
					result.push(v);
				}
			});

			return result.reverse();
		}

		var mysdrc = 10;
		var mysdri = setInterval(function () {

			// if recos are there
			if (typeof window.tnt_msd_reco_tiles_data !== 'undefined') {

				/**
				 * if AEM tile exists
				 *
				 if (document.querySelector('.sdiproxy.link > .aTag') != null) {
                        clearInterval(mysdri);

                        // deduplicate
                        window.tnt_msd_reco_tiles_data = deduplicateWithPriorities(window.tnt_msd_reco_tiles_data);

                        // get number of existing AEM tiles
                        var existing = document.querySelectorAll('.sdiproxy.link').length;
                        // select parent of existing AEM tiles
                        var father = document.querySelector('.sdiproxy.link').parentNode.parentNode.parentNode.parentNode.parentNode.parentNode;
                        // add reco tiles to parent's columns
                        var a = 0;
                        for (var i = existing+1; i <= mysdrecomax; i++) {
                            father.querySelector('.column.span3.column-number-'+i).innerHTML = createTemplate(window.tnt_msd_reco_tiles_data[a]);
                            a++;
                        }

                        // generate welcome text when finished
                        welcomeText();
                    }
				 */

					// if father place exists
				var father = document.querySelector('div[data-tnt-placeholder="mysd"]');
				if (father != null) {
					clearInterval(mysdri);

					// deduplicate
					window.tnt_msd_reco_tiles_data = deduplicateWithPriorities(window.tnt_msd_reco_tiles_data).reverse();

					var count = Math.min(window.tnt_msd_reco_tiles_data.length, mysdrecomax);
					var existing = document.querySelectorAll('.personalizationconta.personalizationcontainer.parbase').length;

					// add reco tiles to parent's columns
					for (var i = existing; i < count; i++) {
						father.querySelector('.column.span3.column-number-' + (i + 1)).innerHTML = createTemplate(window.tnt_msd_reco_tiles_data[i]);
					}

					// generate welcome text when finished
					welcomeText();
				}
			}

			// if timeouted
			mysdrc--;
			if (mysdrc < 0) {
				clearInterval(mysdri);
				conlog('timedout, component missing');

				/**
				 * if there are recos to be displayd
				 * do nothing, otherwise add things in here
				 **/
			}
		}, 250);
	})();
</script>

	if (!window.CQ_Analytics) {
		window.CQ_Analytics = {};
		if (!CQ_Analytics.TestTarget) {
			CQ_Analytics.TestTarget = {};
			CQ_Analytics.TestTarget.clientCode = 0;
		}
	}
</script>
<div class="cloudservices servicecomponents"><div class="cloudservice testandtarget"><script type="text/javascript">
    CQ_Analytics.TestTarget.maxProfileParams = 11;

    if (CQ_Analytics.CCM) {
        if (CQ_Analytics.CCM.areStoresInitialized) {
            CQ_Analytics.TestTarget.registerMboxUpdateCalls();
        } else {
            CQ_Analytics.CCM.addListener("storesinitialize", function (e) {
                CQ_Analytics.TestTarget.registerMboxUpdateCalls();
            });
        }
    } else {
        // client context not there, still register calls
        CQ_Analytics.TestTarget.registerMboxUpdateCalls();
    }
    </script>
</div>

	$(window).on('load', function() {
		if (scsHeader && scsHeader.profile && scsHeader.profile.isLoggedIn() && !window.suppressDatausageOverlay) {
			$.ajax({
				url: '/customer/guest/html/components/datausage_overlay_bundle.js',
				dataType: "script",
				cache: true,
				success: function() {
					PopupJs.init("PORTAL", "en", "POPUP_Portal");
				}
			});
		}
	});
	</script>
